response.overview: A special showcasing ballet works first presented by impresario Sergei Pavlovich Diaghilev during the period of the Ballets Russes (1909-29). Performed by the Paris Opera Ballet, using each ballet's original choreography as well as its sets and costumes.
response.tagline: Petrushka. Noces. The Spirit of the Rose. The Afternoon of a Faun.
response.title: Paris Dances Diaghilev
